body:
Comment 3: 
Thanks! This is a huge improvement.

    107 write
     90 read
     68 select
     61 rt_sigaction
     41 lstat
     31 mmap
     28 close
     23 open
     21 fstat
      9 mprotect

It still seems like it opens and stats a few more files than I'd expect, but it's close
enough that godoc is back to being quick.
